Poppy Montgomery (born Poppy Petal Emma Elizabeth Deveraux Donaghue; June 15, 1972) is an Australian-American actress. She played FBI agent Samantha Spade on the CBS mystery drama Without a Trace from 2002 to 2009 and played Detective Carrie Wells on the CBS/A&E police drama Unforgettable from 2011 to 2016.
